prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with elegant fins and vibrant colors.
I want a fish-like Pokemon that sparkles in the sunlight.
Generate a small aquatic creature with a shimmering tail and unique patterns.
Make a Pokemon that embodies grace and agility in water.
Imagine a playful water-type Pokemon with striking red and white colors.
Design a Pokemon that blends beautifully into its wetland surroundings.
Show me a fish Pokemon that can swim gracefully and has a cheerful demeanor.
